name: AppCenterDistribute
description: Distribute app builds to testers and users via Visual Studio App Center
helpMarkDown: For help with this task, visit the Visual Studio App Center [support site](https://aka.ms/appcentersupport/).
author: Microsoft Corporation
releaseNotes: Fix bug where feature branches were being truncated.

inputs.name: serverEndpoint
inputs.label: App Center service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the service connection for Visual Studio App Center. To create one, click the Manage link and create a new service connection.

inputs.name: appSlug
inputs.label: App slug
inputs.helpMarkDown: The app slug is in the format of **{username}/{app_identifier}**. To locate **{username}** and **{app_identifier}** for an app, click on its name from https://appcenter.ms/apps, and the resulting URL is in the format of [https://appcenter.ms/users/{username}/apps/{app_identifier}](https://appcenter.ms/users/{username}/apps/{app_identifier}). If you are using orgs, the app slug is of the format **{orgname}/{app_identifier}**.

inputs.name: app
inputs.label: Binary file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repo root to the APK or IPA file you want to publish

inputs.name: symbolsPath
inputs.label: Symbols path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repo root to the symbols folder.

inputs.name: pdbPath
inputs.label: Symbols path (*.pdb)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repo root to PDB symbols files. Path may contain wildcards.

inputs.name: dsymPath
inputs.label: dSYM path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repo root to dSYM folder. Path may contain wildcards.

inputs.name: mappingTxtPath
inputs.label: Mapping file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repo root to Android's mapping.txt file.

inputs.name: packParentFolder
inputs.label: Include all items in parent folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Upload the selected symbols file or folder and all other items inside the same parent folder. This is required for React Native apps.

inputs.name: releaseNotesFile
inputs.label: Release notes file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a UTF-8 encoded text file which contains the Release Notes for this version.

inputs.name: isMandatory
inputs.label: Require users to update to this release

inputs.name: destinationId
inputs.label: Destination ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: ID of the distribution group or store the app will deploy to. Leave it empty to use the default group.

instanceNameFormat: Deploy $(app) to Visual Studio App Center

messages.NoApiTokenFound: No API token found on the Visual Studio App Center service connection.
messages.CannotFindAnyFile: Cannot find any file based on %s.
